snippet: After a snowstorm pushed back tipoff, No. 1 Syracuse remained unbeaten, edging North Carolina State.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Syracuse edges North Carolina State, 56-55, to remain unbeaten; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: After a snowstorm pushed back tipoff, No. 1 Syracuse remained unbeaten, edging North Carolina State.

headline.main: In Delayed Thriller, Orange Hold On
headline.print_headline: In Delayed Thriller, Orange Hold On
